review.reviewBody: I have tried many pizza places, this place has one of the best tasting pizzas I've had in this city
yum!!! the best gf pizza and ribs ive tried in the city!!
Tasty tasty pizzas. I can tell they use higher quality ingredients

The pizza is delicious. If you like a thin but doughy crust, this is the pizza for you. The slice of apple with the spices of the Five Spice Pork Belly pizza works so well together. This may be my new favourite pizza. The Cheesy Garlic Bread isn't exactly as pictured in the advertisement (shows a split loaf but it's not) but it's still quite good.
